People in Focus | Dhouha Louati

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=268&user=10620> 	

Meet Dhouha Louati, our SVP for Transformation. Dhouha joined the Group in 2008, fresh out of business school, for what was meant to be a six-month Middle East adventure—one that became a lifetime experience.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=268&user=10620>
